title: PathFactory Content Track Fieldgroup Details
description: This Field group captures and organizes metadata related to content tracks. It includes information such as track titles, content sequencing, and associated content assets. This schema is essential for managing how content is grouped, presented, and tracked within PathFactory, enabling personalized content journeys and providing insights into user engagement with specific content tracks.

pathfactory:contentTrack.title: Pathfactory Content Track
pathfactory:contentTrack.description: Pathfactory Content Track Field Object is used to get all the information related to Content Track which can be used for the analytics purpose and for content track recommendations

xdm:createdAtUTC.title: Created Date (UTC)

xdm:appID.title: App ID
